item.title: Readme First: about the forums
item.author: InfoRekt
item.description:
Hello there stranger, welcome to the forums.

These forums are rather minimalistic. This is done on purpose to preserve load speeds, protect server load and importantly prevent attacks.

There is no underlying database, so there is a lot smaller attack surface. Read https://inforekt.fail/forum/privacy.php for more information about the forum software and it's possibilities and limitations. To claim your name, please use the "spam and test"-forum.

For now the forums will not contain any extra anti-spam features. Incase it gets out of hand, a CAPTCHA will be added.

If you have questions, issues or problems (like a post that needs to be deleted) please email admin@inforekt.fail
